38C9C8C0.Phase29Description: Neyrelle is still missing. I should speak with Lorath. Perhaps he has some idea of what to do next.

61CFD437.Phase11Description: The Tree of Whispers has promised rewards in exchange for collecting the debts of those who hide from them.

8784047D.Phase17Description: Lorath reminds me that Neyrelle did not want to be followed. Nevertheless, I will visit the Tree of Whispers to see if I can gain its trust for whatever is to come next.
